dct_title_s: A prospect of the town and harbour of Ptolomaïs in Phaenicia
dct_alternative_sm: A prospect of the town and harbour of Ptolomaïs in Phænicia
dct_description_sm: Coordinates approximate and based on Greenwich meridian.
Features illustrations of structures and ships.
Shows topography, drainage, places of historical interest.
"2d. Gath. Vol. II. E." -- bottom right corner ; "P. 470" -- top right corner.
